Posts.Content: Thank You for all your time and effort you spend on creating and sharing this vital information for us. Much Gratitude...
Posts.Title: ASCO 2019 MBC Information

Posts.Content: Thank you once again ;-) for your precious time and sharing of your resources. These 'theories' are often hard for me to convey to my MO once I find them from a layman's perspective. Having the research in black and white to hand over to MO when asking for 'low dose' chemo or 'potential for immunotherapy' etc. etc. is so very helpful.
Posts.Title: Drug resistance in oncology

Posts.Content: https://www.gotoper.com/publications/ajho/2015/2015feb/efficacy-... Mayo Clinic MO put me on 1500mg 2x/day, 7 days on/off; few side-effects though mild. Best Wishes
Posts.Title: Written info on one week on one week off with Xeloda
